name: Soulful Harvest
description:
Protect your crops from the ghosts! You need 80 to survive the winter. Can you do it in time?

Game made for Ludum Dare 52

Following software used to make this game:

* Godot (Game engine)

* GIMP (Image creation)

* SFXR (Sound effects)

Music from the album Three Red Hearts by Abstraction (http://abstractionmusic.com)
